author: Erik Schultz
subject: Re: Looking for this Lupin LaserDisc...
body:
Luis Cruz wrote:
> 
> Digital Discs has it listed under their special order
> page http://www.digitaldiscsanime.com/LDAnimeorder.html
> 
> Give them a go.  Good luck!

  The caveat being that they 1) knowingly list items that they don't
have and can't possibly get and 2) will jerk you around about it for
months on end.  I don't think I know anyone who hasn't had a bad
experience with them at least once.  No, if you want imports, I'd say
get them right from Japan.  I'd advise either
http://www.animejungle.com/ or http://www.amy.hi-ho.ne.jp/jigs/.
